derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin usufructus, from Latin usus (et) fructus 'use (and) enjoyment', from usus 'a use' + fructus 'fruit'

means.word_mean: 1. a legal right to use and derive profit from property belonging to someone else provided that the property itself is not injured in any way
